summary: Start growing ornamental flowers on your farm. Mix plants to achieve new color combinations and increase the visual appeal of your crops.

name: Fantasy General II: Onslaught
summary: Death comes from above in the new expansion for Fantasy General II, Onslaught! 13 new aerial units are introduced, greatly expanding the original roster. Deploy these units in the brand-new procedurally generated Onslaught campaign. Combined with the new Iron Maiden mode, Onslaught offers the ultimate Fantasy General II challenge.

name: Family Games
summary: Are you looking for some fun and educational games for your family? Look no further than the Family Games Bundle, a collection of four amazing games that will keep you and your kids entertained for hours.

name: Farm Together: Season 4 Bundle
summary:
This Bundle features 4 content packs for Farm Together, the fun & relaxing farming game!

Candy Pack - Sweet themed content!
Wedding Pack - Wedding themed content!
Polar Pack - Polar themed content!
Fantasy Pack - Fantasy themed content!

name: Farming World: Jam Factory
summary: The Jam Factory DLC for Farming Wold lets you construct a brand new production facility that specialises in the creation of Jam goods.

name: Fanastasis
summary: A spirit attempts to find its memories.

name: Fairy Nights
summary: Fairy Light renews the style and spirit of the best classic platformers of the 90s, bringins new exciting game mechanics and a storyline with the elements of visual novella. If you miss the classic platformers, then Fairy Light will surprise you!

name: Fantastic Sea
summary: This is a blend of strategy / simulation / business / naval games, fantasy world background settings, bright cartoon picture style, day and night effects of conversion, allowing the player to drive a distinctive vessel or airship flying in the sea and the sky, Our goal is the stars and sea!

name: Family Feud
summary:
Experience the exciting classic gameplay of one of America’s hottest gameshows at home now!
Customize your character, then challenge your friends, family, and even other players online for a chance to bring the big prize home.

name: Fausseté Amour
summary: This is the adventures of Koruku Ransu, a young blue-haired warrior. The evil lord Goat Bone has kidnaped her beloved sister and also controls the minds of most of her best friends. Koruku wears a strong pink armor Through seven long stages, one of Kokuru's friend awaits at the end of each one of them - however, she will have to defeat their dark side first and free their controlled minds.

name: Family Park
summary: Visit our realistic VR Family Park and experience whole gama of emotions and a lot of fun. You can have rides all year, every time you want, in winter, at midnight, on monday? Our Park is always open for you! And all of this without waiting for your turn. Just sit in one of our absorbing attractions and enjoy it.

name: Fatal Passion: Art Prison - Collector's Edition
summary: An eccentric artist's creations have sprung to life, and they're terrorizing a small town.

name: Fable II: Knothole Island
summary: Hundreds of years ago, the tribe from Knothole Glade discovered the existence of an island far off the mainland said to offer its inhabitants full control over their weather. Tired of constant Balverine attacks and damp, dreary weather, the tribe elders decided they would find this mythic island and settle there. The ancient civilization who originally lived on the island created the magical artifacts that control the weather, and hid them in dangerous caves so that their warriors would be tested every year.

name: Face on Fire
summary: Face on Fire is a retro action platformer with 12 playable characters and 100+ levels.

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Miraculous Dream in Taleville
summary: Who's the fairest of them all?

name: Fable Rush
summary: Without donate and colorful match3 with exciting plot!

name: Faustão Dating Sim
summary:
In 2015, the ratings of the most-popular Brazilian anime, Domingão do Faustão, started plummeting, and our hero started getting into a deep depression. He couldn't sleep well at night and during the day, he felt tired and unwell, but one day, Faustão met a journalist that would change his life...

Faustão Dating Sim is a comedic visual novel where you get invited by the Brazilian TV host Fausto Silva to a diner and tries to win his love while other TV hosts are trying to steal your heart.

name: Farm Mechanic Simulator 2015
summary: Be your own boss! Enjoy your new career at an authentic farm repair service with Farm Mechanic Simulator 2015. This game gives you a fascinating insight into life of a countryside mechanical facility. Prepare yourself for big adventures with big machines. It's better than reality!

name: Famicom Mini: Dig Dug
summary: Famicom Mini: Dig Dug is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a remake of Namco's Famicom game Dig Dug, and little to no alterations were made on the game to stay faithful to the original title. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Fantasy Fighters
summary: Fantasy Fighters is a turn-based game with single-player and two-player modes. Pick a class of fighters, build your score and unlock new class levels and game items to build a great team!

name: Fashion Craze
summary: Help your customers look their very best in Fashion Craze! Seat customers, take orders, prepare clothes, pick out accessories, and more in 48 levels of fast fashion fun. Featuring a huge variety of styles to offer, ten unique customers, and addictive time management fun, Fashion Craze is a wonderful challenge for gamers everywhere. Try it today.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 37: Spooky Night
summary: A nonogram puzzle game about a penguin family who spends the night at an abandoned, spooky manor.

name: Fallingstar
summary: Breakout but you fight God

name: Fat Dragons
summary: Fight within the ruins of an ancient city, then do combat among the trees in a lush jungle. Dodge the molten fireballs launched from an erupting volcano, and avoid pounding rain storms and lightning strikes amidst the clouds - all while taking out your enemies! Light-hearted arcade action. Colorful retro-styled graphics.

name: Fat Princess: Piece of Cake
summary: Fat Princess: Piece of Cake takes the comic medieval battle royale to the next level with a brand-new free-to-play strategic match-3 game. Charge into battle with 4 different character classes! Make matches to smash through the blue army! Collect gems to upgrade your troops! Feed cake to the princess to unleash her devastating slam attack! Trigger massive combos and save the kingdom!

name: Farmstead Story
summary: A farm simulation card game

name: Fat Kevin
summary: Made in 72 hours by 9 people. The theme was "You are the monster".

name: Fallen London: A Crown of Thorns
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2021.

name: Fasaria World: Ancients of Moons + Server
summary: Fasaria World: Ancients of Moons is a single/multiplayer fantasy online experience that can be played locally from your PC (single player offline). Instructions are included on how to host your own server and how other players can join your game.

name: FawnRun
summary: The only level 2D casual mini-game there is please keep moving.

name: Fairytale Thief: The Goldfish
summary:
One fine morning a lavish palace appears out of thin air.

Not unheard of in a magical world, but still a curious event.

Rumours travel fast, and they say the fabled wish-granting golden fish is being held prisoner inside its own creation.

Sounds like a job for a phantom thief!

name: Fallen London: The Crocodile Who Would Be King
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2021.

name: Fantasy Fighters: Historic Fighters
summary: Historic Fighters is a turn-based game that allows you to play with a historically themed class of your choice in a fantasy battle setting.

name: Fancy Trash
summary: Steal the fanciest trash in the world.

name: Fallen London: The Empress' Shadow
summary:
An addon for Fallen London. The Premium Story for the seasonal event of Sackmas in December, 2016.

Can be started from the Seasonal storylet during Sackmas, or from the Fate page.

name: Family Board Games
summary: Rediscover the world's best loved board games, now brought up to date for the PlayStation 2. It includes family favorites: Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Quatro, Reversi and Enigma.

name: Fall in the Rift
summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, explore the Rift to recover Riftium, a mineral with supernatural properties that can save the world. Nevertheless, the adventure is far from being without danger and you will have to fight to survive in this turn-based strategic roguelite!

name: Family Trainer: Rairai Kyonshizu
summary: The tenth and final Bandai game to use the Family Trainer/Power Pad accesssory for the NES. The player helps a baby kyonshi (jiang shi) find its parents.

name: Fatal Evidence: Cursed Island
summary: Your sister’s old mentor has been murdered, and you’ve been called to his remote island home to investigate! You and your sister arrive just in time for the reading of the will. But this normal dinner quickly takes a dangerous turn when a masked judge traps everyone inside with the murderer, calling for their surrender! It’s up to you to reveal the murderer’s identity and stop the judge from carrying out their sinister plans before it’s too late! Do you have what it takes? Find out in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Farmula Grain Prix
summary: Harvest Racing

name: Fallen London: The House of Silk and Flame
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for December, 2021.

name: Fatrifice
summary: In order to summon a demon, one girl must stuff herself to be the ultimate fatrifice! Help her expand into new shapes and sizes by feeding her!

name: Fallen London: The Calendar Code
summary: The Calendar Code is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Calendar Code was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the third and final story in the Season of Revolutions.

name: Fate of India
summary: This strategy will take you back to the year 1805, where you'll take control of one of the Indian princely states, in order to liberate India from the British invaders, annex the rest of the countries and unite the subcontinent under your command.

name: Fallout 76: Steel Dawn - Deluxe Edition
summary: Steel Dawn is the first chapter in the new Brotherhood of Steel questline, free for Fallout 76 players. Paladin Leila Rahmani and her troops have arrived from California to establish a new Appalachian chapter. Join in their mission to rebuild society and aid in securing valuable technology - but only you can determine how it will be used. Includes the full game and bonus Brotherhood Recruitment Bundle in-game items.

name: Fairytale Symphony
summary: A "definitive edition" of Fairytale Requiem, which comes bundled with Fairytale Encore, a bonus alternative scenario, and a compact release of the Visual Fanbook.

name: Family Tetris
summary: Family Tetris is a plug and play Tetris game released in the fall of 2006.

name: Fast Food
summary: Dizzy's back! In Fast Food, Dizzy must run around mazes scoffing loadsa food - chickens, burgers, pizzas, milkshakes but there's a complication...look out for the monsters.

name: Fairy Tale Mysteries: The Puppet Thief
summary: Discover the truth behind the myth and save the children!

name: Farlife
summary: Farlife is a class-based action RPG set in space. Play as different alien species, each with their own unique abilities! Explore open worlds, Discover alien life, upgrade your arsenal, and fumble your way through the cosmos.

name: Face Pilot: Fly With Your Nintendo DSi Camera!
summary: Soar through the sky, from the comfort of your sofa, with the innovative gliding game Face Pilot!

name: Fall Down! Deluxe
summary: This is a simple but fast-paced and addictive game. Just touch screen to control the ball. Fall down through the holes and avoid the dead line. As time passed, the dead line will run faster and faster. The further you falling down the more your score. Collect the crystals to unlock extra playable characters and backgrounds. The farther you falling down the more crystals you will get.

name: Fallout 76: Skyline Valley - Deluxe Edition
summary: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Skyrim and Fallout 4, welcome you to Fallout 76. Twenty-five years after the bombs fell, you and your fellow Vault Dwellers—chosen from the nation's best and brightest - emerge into post-nuclear America on Reclamation Day, 2102. Explore a vast wasteland, devastated by nuclear war, in this open-world multiplayer addition to the Fallout story.

name: Farming Simulator 2011: Equipment Pack 3
summary: Get busy with this new equipment pack for Farming Simulator 2011! Equipment Pack 3 includes a host of new equipment for setting, rearing and harvesting crops including an 8-furrow Lemken plough, Horsch seed drill, Amazone fertilizer-spreader and much more.

name: Fanais Chess
summary:
Command a space fleet to victory!
You are in command of an entire fleet of space ships! Only you can win the battle for your people! Make your foes rue the day they ever meet you!

name: Faeria: Elements
summary: Test your might and face the elements. This puzzle pack for Faeria contains 40 additional brain-twisting challenges for you to complete. Can you overcome the elements and earn the exclusive cardback? Warning: Many of these puzzles are quite difficult!

name: Far Cry: New Dawn - Limited Edition
summary:
Far Cry: New Dawn Limited Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Knight Pack

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 4
summary: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles, featuring epic fantasy female characters.

name: Familiar Spirit of the Demon Lord
summary: A simulation game from DojinOtome.

name: Fantasy Boy
summary: Fantasy Boy: a roguelike, following the adventure of Boy. Explore a fantasy world, fight many enemies, and have FUN!

name: Farm Together: Oxygen Pack
summary: Plenty of Space themed content for Farm Together, such as new outfits, decorations and farm items to plant and harvest!

name: Fake Happy End
summary: A compelling supernatural mystery set in modern day. Fake Happy End places you in control of a team of young adults, who soon realize only they can perceive the tower that has mysteriously appeared in the middle of town. Why has it appeared, and why can't anyone else see it? Traverse it, and find out!

name: Farm Together: Mistletoe Pack
summary: Plenty of Viking-themed content for Farm Together, such as new outfits, decorations and farm items to plant and harvest!

name: Fate Collectors
summary: Transform into a magical girl in this RPG experience! Find and recruit your teammates, defeat corrupted humans, and save the world from ultimate despair! Controls: Z/Left click = Select X/Right click = Cancel Arrow Keys/Left click = Movement

name: Fate of the Damned
summary: Fate of the Damned is a meticulously crafted custom campaign for BLOOD which aims to speculate and explore another shadowed path that Caleb might've undertaken. While taking care to never stray far from the gameplay formula that made BLOOD so gripping, the campaign will see Caleb journey through new environments that he has not seen before. Gruesome new discoveries await as he tears through hordes of the undead and nothing is left unscathed in his quest for vengeance.

name: Far Cry: Gold Pack
summary: Discover the crazy Far Cry Gold Pack, gathering Far Cry, Far Cry 2, Far Cry 3, Far Cry 3 - Blood Dragon, Far Cry 4, and Far Cry Primal.

name: Fantasy Solitaire: Card Match
summary: All Fantasy Solitaire puzzle and story content can be experienced without purchase. Ads are optional as part of a prize wheel (they are not in the rummy card puzzles game). Play our rummy and solitaire card puzzle game as much as fits your day!

name: Favor Chess
summary: Assemble your own unique chess army to use against your foes. Use new strategies and pieces to compete against players around the globe in a game of pure skill, where cleverness and adaptation are rewarded.

name: Fallen Emiya
summary: This game talks about a story of the Brave Emiya who destoried the Dark Lord. But after that Emiya cursed, and became a mixed devil. At the same time, she chased by human beings who didn't knew the truth. So Emiya was determined to find a way to lift the curse. The player's choice will decide the ending of Emiya.

name: Farmer Time: A Magical Farming Adventure
summary: This is my dream project known as Farmer Time: A Magical Farming Adventure that follows a wizard in its adventure with inheriting a farm which the wizard will need to keep from going bankrupt.

name: Fast Food Chef
summary: Fast Food Chef is a sim-cooking game in which you have the role of making the best food in town with the goal of having as many customers as possible and making as much money as possible to expand the restaurant to other countries.

name: Fatehaven
summary: Combat, romance, adventure, and of course—magic! Master four elements and take on fate itself in this epic, interactive fantasy tale! Six possible endings. Four hours for a single playthrough. Three love interests. Countless choices. Male or female? Leader or loner? Good or evil? What kind of mage will you be?

name: Fantamal
summary: It's a Stardew Vallley-meets-Pokemon experience! Build habitats, catch Fantamals, collect their produces and test their combat potential on battles to earn credits at college. Explore the universe to discover and learn about different Fantamals in different towns.

name: Fast Food Shop Online
summary: Go solo or invite your friends to run the fast food shop at your town! Survive, upgrade shop , buy farm and vehicles , and more!

name: Fallen London: Noises from Upstairs
summary: Addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2019. First entry in the Season of Explorations.

name: Fantasy of War
summary: Fantasy Strategy RPG

name: Fantasy Quest Solitaire
summary:
At the very last moment the Fairy Land was saved from the dark shadows. But now absolute chaos is threatening its peaceful denizens. King Feodor asks the
magic Fairies for help. Are you ready to face this challenge? Play your cards right and solve many challenging quests.

name: FatalZone
summary: FatalZone is an auto shooter with roguelike and RPG elements set in a savage world of zombies. Exterminate zombie hordes, collect resources, upgrade your camp, and level up mercenaries. Humanity must survive at any cost!

name: Fabulous Food Truck
summary: Fabulous Food Truck is an exciting time-management arcade game testing your skills and talent as Cook, Server and Manager of a busy food truck with a steady stream of demanding customers.

name: Farm Frenzy 3 HD
summary:
The popular game about a farm, an incredible collaboration of genres "Farming game" and "Time management", is waiting for most ambition farmers of the world!
So you think you've mastered farming sims? Try running five farms in one game! Farm Frenzy 3 challenges you to overhaul struggling farms around the world. Conquer Farm Frenzy 3, and you might find yourself president of the Farmer's Union!

name: Falling to Heaven
summary: Falling to Heaven is a rogue-like, action, twin-stick shooter. Players will play as a veteran mercenary who has experienced many battles, guided by a mysterious voice, to fight a way out from the bottom of hell, and learn about the truth of his falling.

name: Far Out: Selene
summary: Step into the role of lab technician Zack Paterson and uncover the mystery of Selene's expedition. With no maps or guidance to rely on, your wits become the sole compass guiding the path. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure, as multiple endings await your decisions!

name: Fangs and Friends
summary: An award winning co-op puzzle game between two unlikely allies: a vampire, and a mage!

name: Fading Light: Antiworld
summary: The post-war world of nuclear explosion has trapped you in a dark circulated antiworld. Armed only with a faint flashlight and antimatter collector, you have to generate enough energy and hold on till the first sight of the morning light. Hurry, but be careful, it's rumored that you are not alone...

name: False Server
summary: A game developer launching his discord server while a pandemic is going on outside in the real world.

name: Fallen London: The Heart, the Devil and the Zee
summary: The Heart, the Devil and the Zee is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Heart, the Devil and the Zee was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second entry in the Season of Stones.

name: Fate Crawler
summary: Fate Crawler is a dynamic and colorful adventure featuring both classical and new Rogue-like elements. Choose your hero and lead his fate by changing various events into your favor. Combine unique abilities and artifacts to form individual play style for each run.

name: Fairy Tail: Ultimate Dance of Magic
summary: A 3D command RPG that lets the player utilize a number of the mages from the Fairy Tail series in mini magic battles. Play events and join a personal guild to gain rewards and collect a variety of units, stylized in ways never before seen in the manga or anime.

name: Fantasy Town
summary: Build your vibrant town replete with talented citizens, plant a farm full of prospering crops, or produce valuable goods like milk and eggs on an animal farm! You can also explore the beautiful countryside where surprises abound because limitless adventure and infinite happiness are in store for you in this RPG farming simulation!

name: Fallen Light
summary: Cory wakes up several years into the future, everything has changed and his friends are missing. Complete puzzles, hide from monsters and explore the world around you to try and found what happened and where your friends are.

name: Fallen London: Our Lady of Pyres
summary: Our Lady of Pyres is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Our Lady of Pyres was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the second entry in the Season of Wrecks.

name: Farpost 44
summary: Farpost 44 is an Action-Adventure taking place in a 44-hour time loop. Unlock multiple story-paths and endings to unravel the mystery of the Farpost 44 catastrophe where each playthrough is based on your choices and actions.

name: Farm Machines Championships 2013
summary: Participate in the ultimate farmers' showdown. Sit behind the wheel of tractors and harvesters to see who is the fastest and most accurate farmer in the competition. Compete in many different events, that require speed and accuracy - harvesting wheat, ploughing the field, bricking the straw and many more. Your tractor is not good enough to win? Upgrade it to gain advantage over your rivals or buy a new one. There can be only one world champion!

name: Farty Bird
summary: Take on a procedurally generated series of comedic enemies and fight your friends for the top score in Farty Bird!

name: Fantasy Gladiators
summary: Enter the world of Fantasy Gladiators, where creatures span from the normal (Kings) to the unexpected (a tiny, murderous clown). You must carefully craft your dream roster and mercilessly take down your opponent. Every decision could make or break your entire dynasty.

name: Fairy Fencer F: Refrain Chord - Day One Edition
summary: Fang and the gang return in this all-new Tactical RPG, directly connected to the story of Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force. Fang and the others run into a mysterious woman named Glace, who has the ability to brainwash other people with her song. Another woman named Fleur joins their party, who also has the power of song. The two are known as Muses, and are able to boost or change other peoples’ abilities with the power of singing. ​ What could Glace's motives be?​

name: Fallumns
summary:
For Ludum Dare 48 Jam

I've always felt the Match-3 genre had the most depth! Wouldn't you agree?

Z and X rotate, Esc or ENTER pause. press Ctrl+Y to change controls.

name: Family Party: 30 Great Games Outdoor Fun
summary: 30 games that simulate having fun outside!

name: Family Games
summary: Family Games is a collection of timeless pen-and-paper games for the whole family.

name: Family Chess
summary: Pick your favorite Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

name: Farmland Realm
summary: The little farm is waiting for you to turn into a Farmland Realm!

name: Fantasy Fighters
summary: Prepare for epic battles in "Fantasy Fighters"! Choose your faction, plan your moves, and unleash devastating attacks on your opponents in local multiplayer. Explore a rich world filled with engaging characters.

name: Fault Line
summary: Faultline features a clever puzzling mechanic that makes for some unique platforming action. The main character is a robot who can launch his hands out to grab hold of nodes in the level. These nodes can then be folded over each other, hiding entire sections of the level from view.

name: Falcomaster3000: Episode 1
summary: A masked player must compete with the pros to save Smash Bros from a meta-gaming apocalypse.​

name: Falldown 3D
summary:
Easy to play and really entertaining, Falldown is a fast-paced game where only speed and reflexes matter.
The rule is extremely simple : avoid the shelves, keep the ball bouncing, and get down as far as possible.
Ghost bonus, slow-motion, and multiball bonuses will be here to help!

name: Family in Puzzle House
summary:
Welcome to Family in Puzzle House!
Sophie, a mischievous young girl, lost her key while she was playing in a room of the House.
Now the key is hidden, lost somewhere among the objects in the room.
Please help poor little Sophie find her key!
Find new and useful items in the various characters’ rooms as you search to see where the key is hiding.
If you don’t know how to use an item, check out the hint!
It’ll really help you in finding the key.

name: Falling Bush
summary: Pointless fun, click, drag and drop a boneless George W. Bush. Bush falls onto bubbles with realistic physics. With Falling Bush, You take control of George W. Bush while he is falling down. You can do with him whatever you want!

name: Family Fest Presents Movie Games
summary: Party game based on movie themes.

name: Fantastic Honey
summary: Fantastic Honey - A hentai puzzle game in which you have to piece together images of elves, who are striving to take off some of their clothes! A lot of beautiful pictures await you, in which every player will definitely find what he likes!

name: Farlands: First Landing
summary: Congratulations, you've bought your own planet! An agrarian rock in the edge of the galaxy, which, for some reason, was almost given away for free. So the time has come to leave the hectic and stressful life of the overcrowded metropolis for a more rural and rewarding life.

name: Fall of Gods
summary: Hack and slash your way through the ancient gods of Egypt in this action-packed rogue-lite developed by a team of two. Explore randomly generated dungeons, unlock powerful abilities and obliterate your enemies with devastating combos!

name: Fantasy Games
summary:
Fantasy Games is a double games pack containing the following adventure games:

Perilous Swamp: Deep in a Perilous Swamp, your quest is to find and rescue a Princess held captive by an evil Wizard before escaping out of the swamp. You are presented with a map of your surroundings and text tells you any objects you can see. As you move around the swamp you will encounter various creatures who you can fight, run from or bribe (if you have enough treasure). If you choose to fight then you decide how many combat strength points to use. Spells can be found and used to help you on your quest.

Sorcerer's Island: Similar to Perilous Swamp, this time you are on an island and you must attempt to leave it. One difference is you can encounter people like the King of the Dwarves and the Grand Sorcerer himself to help you.

name: Farm 2
summary:
You're back on a happy farm full of funny animals and plants that require your care.

Johnny and Annie go on holiday to their uncle's farm. Upon arrival they find their uncle sick in bed and decide to take care of his farm.

Help them out and see how the small farm grows into a big family business. Buy new pens and upgrade already owned. Then plant new plants or buy animals, so you can produce more goods and deliver more orders to a nearby town.

name: Fadry
summary: Fadry is a linear, story-focused game which explores a meticulously crafted dark fantasy world through the eyes of several different characters.

name: Fania
summary: Join Fania, a hungry panda, on an adorable whimsical journey through different places, solving puzzles, and meeting quirky characters. Help Fania collect ingredients, overcome challenges, and discover the ultimate recipe, all while spreading joy and smiles in this delightful adventure.

name: Farther Than the Blue Sky
summary:
There were just five of us when we first started developing rockets. We didn't have enough money, equipment, or knowledge. Everyone told us we would fail, but I...

We... didn't give up. None of us.

We lived on Amanoshima, an island far to the south of mainland Japan and the location of a large aerospace program. Our school, Amanoshima Academy, had a prestigious aerospace curriculum and students from all over the nation attended it, eyes set on being a part of the next generation of rocket scientists.

"Hey. Want to make rockets with us?"

That was why I was so surprised when asked me to join her. I was enrolled in the normal curriculum, not aerospace, and nobody ever doubted the fact that I was an idiot. But when I looked into her eyes, I saw how sincere she was... and it shook me.

Finally, I decided to join the small rocket club she was the president of: Byakko.

"You won't make rockets at Byakko."

The one who told me that was Reimei Kaho, vice-president of the largest and most illustrious rocket club of the many at our school: the ARC. She had come to notify us that we had been dissolved.

There was only one way to stave off our own abolition. We had to win a rocket competition before the beginning of the second term. There were five of us. Arisa. Me.

"We can make rockets at Byakko too."

Ibuki Nazuna, who loved rockets like nobody else.

"I want to be in your club."

Michibiki Honoka, my childhood friend who loved to play tricks on others.

And, finally, Kaho, who had made so much trouble for us initially. Together we tackled rocket science.

We had to win a competition if we wanted our club to endure. And, even more than that, we wanted to launch a rocket that our own hands had built and see it soar toward space.

The Karman line: 100km of altitude.

Higher than the clear sky.

We worked hard and chased our dreams to the edge of space.

name: Farm Frenzy 3: American Pie
summary: Can you keep up with Scarlett and the latest advancements in technology as you grow crops, feed animals, collect produce and manufacture goods? Of course you can! Just don't let the zany new animations distract you from the task at hand. Featuring 90 all-new levels, packed with never-before-seen characters, buildings and challenges, Farm Frenzy 3: American Pie promises a bumper crop of fun.

name: Faded Stories: Full Moon
summary: Unburied and forgotten undead gather in the city center, while the citizens of Greenberg go about their day-to-day lives.

name: Fateholder Quest
summary: Based on the Brewsterland Studios game "Fateholders of Tetsoidea", re-made in the Smile Game Engine! A fun and charming party based RPG. This is a game for people who like potato salad more than potato chips.

name: Fallen London: The Icarian Cup
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for December, 2020.

name: Fate of the World: Denial
summary: Denial is the mission that says: “What if we didn't have to worry about climate change?”

name: Fall Apartment
summary: Short interactive graphical story about a girl describing an important moment of her life through a series of drawings

name: Fax
summary:
Fax is a trivia game which asks questions about a number of topics, including: General Knowledge, Sports, History and Entertainment. This was released by Exidy in 1983 and written by Vic Tolomei and Larry Hutcherson hopeful to play on the Trivial Pursuit craze as it was released over a year earlier than the registered Trivial Pursuit versions (produced by Bally/Sente).

The game came in what was essentially a jukebox cabinet (complete with a woodgrain finish), which lent itself to possible markets outside of the typical arcade setting. It had a 9-inch monitor mounted in the center, logo on the bezel itself and a row of buttons on each side of the screen to accommodate two player simultaneous play. Fax used unique compression to hold nearly 3700 questions in as small of storage as possible. Exidy also sold several EPROM replacement kits that provided new questions but they are nearly impossible to find today.

name: Fancy Solitaire

Known alternatively as Klondike, or Patience in some parts of the world, this game includes both Draw 1 and Draw 3 variations. Featuring dozens of customisation options for deck styles and table styles, and a selection of music, play in your own way! Are you a Solitaire master? Try out the Leaderboards and stats to see your global rank. Become the best player and the trophy is yours! Solitaire has never looked this good!

name: Fantasia Sango 2
summary:
Thousands of years ago, the great Xuanyuan, also known as Huangdi - Yellow Emperor - fought against the ruler Chiyou for control over China. Demons joined both forces in this great battle. Finally, Huangdi got the upper hand and became the emperor of China. Shortly before his death, he decided to reincarnate as a mortal many years later, so he came to the border of paradise, and spoke with the dragon demon Yinglong, who was supporting his rival before, as well as other demons. Yinglong descended upon the Earth, and his body parts turned into powerful weapons and artifacts - his claw became a sword, his eye a pearl, and his heart took the shape of a seal. The legends say that if someone can get one of the three artifacts, he can once again wield the power in the whole China.

Fast-forward to 196 AD. It is the time of Eastern Han dynasty, the end of one of the several golden epochs of the Chinese civilization. Two gods, Yunkong and Daotian, are playing chess with each other to decide the fate of China. In the village Zhaode live two young noblemen, Chu Ge and his best friend Han Jing, as well as his beloved one Shen Yan. They live a normal life and wish to move to the capital and to find good jobs there. But an accident makes them meet their true destiny...

The second Huanxiang Sanguozhi game takes us to the time period that preceeded the Three Kingdoms era by about a hundred years. Once again, the game deals with concrete historical events and characters, but adds many fictional elements to them, mostly of supernatural character. The gameplay is very similar to that of the first game. You control a party of heroes and fight enemies in turn-based or active-time combat (you can choose the type of combat since the beginning). The game features pre-rendered backgrounds and 3D cut scenes. It also allows you to choose between three difficulty levels.

Not only can you do your standard versus matches, there's even your traditional arcade mode as well as a survival mode! You can even play with others online! Famicom Fighters also utilizes the original Famicom/NES controls, allowing you to even use a Famicom/NES controller!

However, the question remains as to why they're all together like this. What has brought them here? Who is running the tournament? Who knows...

Are you playing with power?

The game also was ported to PlayStation Vita, adding full-voice acting, among other enhancements. This version was released in Japan on November 27, 2014.

Originally developed by Puraguru and Multiterm under the title Fantasy Earth: The Ring of Dominion, it released under that title by Square Enix as a paid product through its PlayOnline service.

Defend their Brahmin herds and trade routes from crazed Cultists and monstrous creatures in two new Public Events and side quests, plus face enemies infected with a deadly new Daily Ops mutation for a chance to earn new rewards!

name: Fantastic Keyboard Party
summary: Is it possible to type 100 words? No.

name: FarmZone
summary: The goal in FarmZone is to survive and protect your farm. You are just a farmer in the world full of zombies. You have to fight them to protect yourself and your farm. Travel the open world, explore new towns and grow your farm.

name: Famicom Mini: TwinBee
summary:
Famicom Mini: TwinBee is a recreation of the original TwinBee video game released on a variety of Japanese consoles in the 1980s. Released in 2004 under the 'Famicom Mini' label, this port brings all the material from the original counterpart and converts them for the handheld Game Boy Advance system.

As with the original, this port is only available in the country of Japan.

name: Fallen World
summary: Fallen World is an Survival-Horror Adventure Dinosaur game inspired by the original Jurassic Park film.

name: Fantasy Gardens
summary: This is a relaxed plant simulation game. The adjustment parameters can simulate the ever-changing plant growth state. Players can design their fantasy gardens with imagination and creativity.

name: Farland Story: Juuou no Akashi
summary: The seventh entry in the Farland Story series.

name: Fate/Extella: Celebration Box
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Fate/Extella: The Umbral Star / Fate/Extella Link
Extella gotchi
Special Illustrated Box
Illustrated Chara-Fine Graph (A5) by Arco Wada
Fate/Extella Link Celebration BOX-exclusive Nero Bridal Gown DLC
Fate/Extella: The Umbral Star Costume Set Product Code (PlayStation 4 version only, Nintendo Switch already included)
Fate/Extella Link PuniPuni Costume Set Product Code

name: Fantasy Lands
summary: A single player strategy game in the style of euro board games. Around 30 minutes per game. Collect resources. Explore. Recruit adventurers and fight monsters or complete quests. Improve lands. Research spells. Unlock races, adventurers, land & quest cards, spells and monsters.

name: Fantasy Madness: Bloodbath
summary: Fantasy Madness: Bloodbath is a roguelike action-survival game where forces of nature fight against hordes of evil. Gain new skills, loot powerful items and defeat all who stand in your way… By all means!

name: Fashion Girls

name: Fax These to Smith!!!

name: Fat Prisoner Simulator

name: Fairyfail
summary: Slip into the role of a failed fairytale character and have your friends & foes join you as you build traps and platforms in this fantastical plattformer setting to leave the others behind in several rounds of racing to the finish line.

name: Farming Sweeper
summary: Build, manage and grow your farm in a unique way: Solving puzzles with traditional minesweeper mechanics and managing your business finances in a relaxing game with great replay factor.

name: Family Bundle
summary: Includes Chill Panda, Crazy Zen Codeword, and Santa Tracker.

name: Familiar Travels: Volume One

name: Fantasy Monarch
summary: Monarch is a journey from fledgling adventurer to master of the world and beyond. A world of surprise with the freedom to pursue your own destiny. Wherever that may lead.

name: Farming Simulator 19: Kverneland & Vicon Equipment Pack
Fan Club
summary: Anna, a mainstream TV star, accepts the invitation of her “fan club” to spend a weekend with them. Very quickly, this moment will turn into a nightmare. She is in fact kidnapped by border-line admirers who have set out to revive her career through the emotions she has made them feel.

name: Fantasy Mall
summary: Arcade shopping mall simulator

name: Fast Running
summary: Fast running, challenge the limits.

name: Fantasy Tavern Simulator
summary: Fantasy Tavern Simulator is a first-person 3D fast-paced simulator game. Serve beer, prepare food, furnish your tavern and take part in random events like brawls, royal feast or occult rituals. Make your guests feel welcome. Make your Tavern known!

name: FarmFury!
summary: FarmFury! is a multiplayer farm simulation game where anime-style farmers try to sabotage each other.

name: Farlight Explorers
summary: Extract and gather resources from different planets. Manage the supply of electricity, water, food and oxygen of your base in order to survive. Automate the creation of new products. Build a spaceship to transport your products to other places...

name: Fantasy Realm TD
summary: Try tower defense with many towers & defense strategies! TD game from TD players

name: Family Card Games Fun Pack
summary: Play your favorite card games like you’ve never seen them before. Interactive gameplay and crisp graphics make Family Card Games Fun Pack a fun time for the entire family. Includes Seven in a Row, Old Maid (Old Man), The Rich Man, Speed, Splash, Poker, Page One, Blackjack, Seven Bridges, and Concentration!

name: Factor D
summary: Manga-style 2d turn-based fighting game, choose 1 character among the 12, with different endings for each one, discover the story by winning with each character

name: Farm Day 2021
summary: Decorate your town with a lot of beautiful decorations to make your fun farm city unique.

name: Family cobweb
summary:
Difficult life, unjust, gangster world ... All this sends the hero into wandering around the world and all for revenge. 
 
You have to find out how much the web of these mafia families is tangled....

name: Factoryopolis
summary: Build and run a car factory to design, produce and sell high-quality cars, while expanding your business. Manage resources, research new technologies, and meet market demand. As the factory grows, you can hire more employees and unlock new features.

name: Farm Expert 2017: Hard Terrain
summary:
Hard Terrain DLC includes:
* A whole new world with rains, muddy terrains, slimy fields for off-road fun
* Real-time ponds growing during rain
* Towbar for tractor pulling
* Building repair and rebuilding functionality, using predefined materials (barn as a prototype to repair/rebuild)
* Ladders to climb up the barn

name: Fantasy Strike: Core Pack
summary: The Core Pack gives you access to several game modes: Arcade mode, Versus mode for local play (including standard and team battle), Survival modes (including 4 sub-modes), and the over-the-top Boss Rush mode. The Core Pack also lets you send and receive direct challenges from friends online.

name: Farming Simulator 2013: Official Expansion 2
summary: The second official expansion for Farming Simulator 2013 brings a harvest of new content for your game including vehicles and machinery and tutorials to create your own content.

name: Factropy
summary: A factory simulation game full of genre tropes, plus a bunch of ideas a solo developer failed to mod into other games. A mix tape!

name: Fall Fear Fly Redemption
summary: Adventure is a journey with an uncertain outcome. Fall Fear Fly Redemption provides an immersive experience that keeps the player guessing. Take a leap of faith and see where the journey will take you. Be part of a Social Entrepreneur and Community Revitalization effort.

name: Fait: The Machine
summary:
My nightmare it's come true.
The worst thing i don't know how much time is gone. So that I don’t know if someone else survived? What happened to my enemies? Too many questions to which I have no answers...
First I need to get out of here and who knows, maybe I will find all the answers through the way.

name: Faceless
summary: Trust your intuition and face your fears. But don't face that man. Things done cannot be undone.

name: Farm Life
summary:
Farming game for Nintendo DS published in 2007 for the European market. Developed by Destineer and Black Lantern Studios and published by Ubisoft.

Farm Life is a fantastic game where you'll have the opportunity to manage your own farm! In this fantastic game, you'll be able to plant crops, care for animals, and expand your farm. The game combines strategy and simulation in a fun and challenging way. This game offers a deep and immersive experience that lets you create and manage your own farm. It's a perfect game for all lovers of farming and simulation games! Great, right?

name: Farma Force
summary: Farma Force is a 2D tower defense strategy game. You play for the side of the immune system that fights against various diseases that enter your body. Organize the protection of the body from ailments and save the most valuable thing for everyone - health!

name: Fall Jo!
summary: In this challenging game a ball is falling by gravity. Your goal is to guide the ball to the ground by avoiding nasty obstacles. Tap the screen and get a boost. This way you can get through the obstacles. Game Center for high score leaderboards!

name: Fairy of Sit-ups
summary:
Let's secretly support the 
 
woman who can't do sit-ups. 
 
Click to shoot a bullet!

name: Fantasy Match Puzzle
summary: Are you ready to test your eyes with Fantasy Match Puzzle, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games, in which you have to find the objects while the clock is ticking.

name: Fairy Tale Puzzles: Magic Objects - Alice in Wonderland: The Tea Party
Farming Simulator 19: Anderson Group Equipment Pack
summary: Expand your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator 19! This DLC contains 13 new implements from Anderson Group.

name: Fairmoon Museum
summary: Start your life as a curator in Fairmoon where you'll fix up and fill up a museum in a sleepy town full of interesting residents with lots to say. Customize your character, improve your house and local businesses, and get to know more about this curious little town.

name: Factorio: Space Exploration
summary:
Space Exploration is an overhaul mod for Factorio that continues player's journey after launching the rocket. Expand your factory into space and manage interplanetary logistics. Travel around the solar system in buildable ships and reach light speed to beat the game.

The Space Exploration mod predates the Space Age DLC and both are being developed by the same individual, so they will have similar elements. Space Exploration is meant for players looking for a lengthy, expert challenge.

name: Fallen London: A Little Pandemonium
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Celebrations.

name: Fantasy Inn Simulator
summary: You are an innkeeper, on a journey to transform a run-down inn into a bustling social space. Craft items, food, and beer to please your customers and improve your reputation as the best tavern in the entire country.

name: Farming Simulator 17: Platinum Edition
summary:
Take on the role of a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 17: Platinum Edition! Immerse yourself in three huge open worlds, loaded with a harvest of new content!

Discover a new South American playground exclusive to the Platinum Edition, and its authentic landscapes, unique vegetation, railway network, local cows, and sugarcane fields, offering a total change of scenery and more gameplay possibilities! Drive more than 275 authentic farming vehicles and equipment from over 80 manufacturers including AGCO brands (Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson or Valtra), as well as new brands exclusive to this Platinum Edition such as Stara, TT, Bizon and Gessner Industries. Harvest many types of crops including sunflowers, soybeans, sugarcanes and more. Take care of your livestock – including cows, sheep, chickens and pigs – try your hand at forestry, and sell your produce to expand your farm! Transport your goods with trucks and trailers, or load and drive trains to quickly reach your destination.

Grow your farm online with other players, and download community-created mods for an ever-expanding Farming Simulator experience!

name: Fantastic Creatures
summary: Turn based 4X strategy game that takes place in mythological China. Incarnate one of the four fantastic creatures: Dragon, Tiger, Turtle or Fenghuang and expand your domination over the land of Tian.

name: FactoryX
summary: A chemical factory that needs to be destroyed.

name: Fall Valley
summary: Step into the breathtaking world of Fall Valley, where the vibrant hues of autumn await your discovery. Immerse yourself in a serene, orange-colored wonderland as you embark on a soul-soothing journey through this stunning valley.

name: Fateful Mages
summary: Relaxing 2d puzzle game where you unlock characters and stories through solving puzzles and decide their fate in a magical but unforgiving world.

name: Farmer Fran: Running Out of Sunlight!
summary: Be the best farmer and save the day!

name: Farm Expert 2019
summary: The special edition of farming simulator Farm Expert 2019, which succeeded on mobile platforms, is now on Nintendo Switch.

name: Fallout: A Tale of Two Wastelands

It upgrades Fallout 3's mechanics to those of New Vegas without compromising the feel and balance of the original. New Vegas mechanics like companion wheel, companion perks, weapon mods, crafting, recipes, harvestable plants, and poisons have been added to the DC wasteland items, NPCs, and world.

name: Falnarion Tactics III
summary: A missing queen, a world engulfed in war, a mysterious new hero. Take control of a colorful cast of characters from both the perception of the heroes and the villains, as you fight the final battle for Nerfelo.

name: Fairy Rush: Fly to Candyland
summary:
Fly to Candyland, swipe, jump, duck to dodge obstacles and win the race!
Collect stars, cupcakes by flying through sunflowers and pumpkins on the way to Candyland. Help Pan, Clara, Teemo and others fairy to win the race!

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Magic
summary: Those with great power are often rejected by their societies, who regard them as dangerous. These talented outcasts often search for others, to exchange mystical knowledge.

name: Fable of the Sword
summary: This is a galgame with a story of ancient. It takes the developing group 蔷薇千墨 6 years to finish. With full-audio, this game will present you an experience when swords did the talk for you. And with the amazing theme song, it will like returning to the ancient, simpler time.

name: Fatal Frame: Mask of the Lunar Eclipse - Digital Deluxe Upgrade
Fantasy Mosaics 28: Treasure Map
summary: The penguins are off on a new adventure to solve colorful mosaic puzzles!

name: Farming Simulator 22: Fendt 900 Black Beauty
summary: Strong, black, and beautiful: Get the Fendt 900 Vario Black Beauty for Farming Simulator 22, and award your farm with some dark elegance when you roam the roads and fields. With up to 415 units of horsepower for the top configuration, and the striking design of the Fendt Vario series, you’ll be ready for more - whatever your farming operation requires.

name: Fat & Furious
summary: Fat & Furious is a 2D combat game about fast food parody! Choose among these obese and comic characters! And beat the sinister minister of the restauration industry!

name: Fantasteroids
summary: Fast-paced gameplay, rainbow colours and snappy animations all come together to give you a retro arcade-feel game with renewed graphics and avatars. There's a variety of different modes for you to choose from, and different skins to unlock and leaderboards for you to show off to your friends!

name: Faction Wars
summary: A grid based single / local multiplayer strategy game where two factions clash in deadly turn based battles.

name: Fast Jump
summary: Action game in which you teleport between platforms, pick up power-ups, and shoot all the monsters you encounter along the way.

name: Family Jewels
summary: Spend some time in Walnut Grove, where you never know who you might run into.

name: Farm & Survive Bundle
summary: A bundle of Mr. Prepper and Farm Manager 2022.

name: Family Adventures Paris
summary: Join Family Adventures Paris and be part of an incredible journey! Meet the Millers, loving parents Peter and Emily, talented Jessica, and sporty Steven - as they travel to the French capital, exploring the beautiful streets and experiencing the culture, art, and history that Paris holds for them.

name: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle 2
summary: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters and backgrounds.

name: Fast Cubes
summary: Fast Cubes is a puzzle game with time limits. Your objective is to place the cubes in their respective slots. Pass through portals, avoid spikes and find keys to achieve your objective. You'll need to think and to act to win this game.

name: F/A-18 Hornet 3.0
summary: F/A-18 Hornet is a Simulation game, developed and published by Graphic Simulations, which was released in 1997.

name: Far Lands
summary: Far Lands is a sandbox oriented SURVIVAL game. Build and defend your base from creatures. Gather resources, craft better gear and discover new DIMENSIONS.

name: Fat Fritz 2.0 SE
summary: Fat Fritz 2.0 is the successor to the revolutionary Fat Fritz, which was based on the famous AlphaZero algorithms. This new version takes chess analysis to the next level and is a must for players of all skill levels.

name: Fairytale Theatre
summary: Momotaro's Adventurous Activity

name: Famousity
summary: Unique online multiplayer card game where famous people from history meet each other and form legendary teams.

name: Fairy Girl
summary: Every forest needs care. Caring for such an ancient forest is especially important. A fairy takes care of this forest, living in it in peace and harmony.

name: Fairyland: Incursion
summary: Tabletop RPG. Fairy of Fairy Land are protected against armies of human.

name: Farsh
summary: A puzzle game where players traverse floating platforms by rolling and unrolling a carpet.

name: Fantasization
summary: Fantasization is a team-based roleplaying game with turn-based tactical combat, deep RPG mechanics and an evolving procedurally generated world with multiple factions.

name: Far Cry Anthology Bundle
summary: Experience the thrill of the award-winning Far Cry franchise through the Anthology Bundle. Take on four iconic, twisted villains, including Vaas, Pagan Min, Joseph Seed, and Antón Castillo (starring Giancarlo Esposito) in this limited edition bundle.

name: Fakeway
summary: Dig, fight, collect, and explore. If you like Terraria very much, you can try this game. It will also give you a different experience.

name: Fallen London: Damp Martyrs
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for September, 2021.

name: Fantasy Life Online
summary: A sequel to the Nintendo 3DS life-sim/RPG this time for mobile platforms with a more straight up sim angle.

name: Face 2 Face
summary:
In a disturbing turn of events, Richter Farlane, renowned boss of the Japanese multi-media company Artemis, has been found dead. Now, the investigation rests on your shoulders! You'll have to question the various suspects, collect crucial clues and combine them skillfully! Mix two clues to create a delicious cocktail (and, incidentally, a new lead).

Face to Face is an investigative visual novel based on a system of combining clues to uncover new leads, and find the killer!

name: Faces of the Forest
summary: A short horror game by Lunar Finch for the 2022 HPS1 Halloween Jam.

name: Far From Normal
summary: A small, fun couch game where you get to try and defeat your friends for the spotlight.

name: Fairyland: Merge and Magic
summary: Learn some merge magic with a young fairy in a free Merge game online. Match 3 items to receive an advanced object, earn gold coins and discover keys to unlock new lands. Leverage farm game features and grow crops like grapes and bananas. The Fairy Godmother will teach you magic and help performing various tasks. The free Merge game features a lovely fantastic story. Meet Prince Charming and other fairy-tale characters as you explore the magical kingdom. If you ever wondered what free online games for girls may look like, then you cannot pass on this fun Match 3 puzzle. Play the fairy merge game and make friends with fantastic beasts and enchanted creatures like dragons and unicorns.

name: Fairyland: Guild
summary: Hire mercenaries, buy potions, scrolls, and equipment to collect as many coins as possible in the Caves of Elements and get the highest rank.

name: Faeria: Puzzle Pack Elements
summary: Test your might and face the elements.This puzzle pack for Faeria contains 40 additional brain-twisting challenges for you to complete.Can you overcome the elements and earn the exclusive cardback?Warning: Many of these puzzles are quite difficult!

name: Fairy Tower Defense
summary: "Fairy Tower Defense" - an exciting game in the genre of Tower Defense, in which you have to protect your castle from the armies of the undead and other fabulous monsters.

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Cinderella 2
summary: Explore amazing worlds! Let your imagination roam free! Hurry and get to the ball before the wicked sisters!

name: Farmer Pug Dash
summary: Your animals have all gone missing and it's your job to get them back! Find your animals in adventure mode and collect coins to decorate your farm! Find them all!

name: Fall for Greed
summary:
In 7 days a witch will come for your life, will you be able to stand against her?

Fall for Greed is a turn based game set in an unforgiving dark fantasy world where death is permanent.

Survive, fight enemies and acquire companions to get closer to your goal.

name: Fail-Safe
summary: A short piece of Interactive Fiction written by Jon Ingold.

name: Fairy Fire: Defender of the Fairies
summary: Up for some retro arcade action? Extra weapons, upgrades, smart bombs etc are your favorite tools? Then this great arcade clone is for you! Survive waves of evil creatures in this fantastic, fast paced side scroller. If you like games like Defender, Data Storm or Drop Zone, you will LOVE Fairy Fire!

name: Fast Food Crisis
summary: A culinary battleground where iconic fast foods face their greatest threat: an uprising of militant vegetables. you take charge as a sentient pizza slice or a defiant hamburger, and more against these green invaders.

name: Far light
summary: a game where all that matters is your choices and in the end not always the good ending for you will be the good ending for everyone and not even the worst ending will be the best ending for everyone

name: Farmer's Dynasty: Potatoes & Beets
summary: Farmer's Dynasty: Potatoes & Beets DLC expands your extensive vegetable assortment. With new machines it ensures the promising cultivation and harvesting of your new products!

name: Fast Travel: Loot Delivery Service
summary: Fast Travel is a time trial racing game where you must use a hover bike to navigate strange and dangerous environments to deliver loot boxes. While piloting the hover bike, you must maintain your balance to make sure you lose as little of your cargo as possible and avoid crashing.

name: Family Jockey
summary: Family Jockey (ファミリージョッキー) is a party race game that can be easily played by a large number of people with easy operation by anyone from children to adults. By shaking the Wii remote and the nunchuk as a rein, you can accelerate the horse or hit the whip to make it drastically dash, and you can feel the jockey feeling. A variety of courses such as “Oval”, “Nangoku Resort”, “Western”, etc. are waiting for the jockey, and many unique horses that can be selected according to the player's preference will appear, so you can enjoy playing as many times as you like receive. In various battle modes where up to four players can participate, you can also use “Mii” to play races with family and friends.

name: Fantastic Football Fan Party
summary: Get ready for a Fantastic Football Fan Party and explore the excellent party fun based around the beautiful game and its fans. Battle for countless trophies and bragging rights…right in the middle of your living room! Create your own player, in any style you like. Unlock countless additional funky items to pimp up your character! Become a lightning quick winger…or an outstanding acrobatic goal scorer. Get the crowd pumped by drumming them into a frenzy! Show off your extraordinary ball juggling skills, score unbelievable goals in a fast-paced shoot out and dodge crazed fans as you celebrate your victory! Have your own Fantastic Football Fan Party at home and show how football you are! Key Features: - Experience 10 fun-filled party games based around the beautiful game and ist fans! - Create your own player, in any style you like. - Unlock countless additional funky items to pimp up your character - Battle for countless trophies and bragging rights - Go crazy with multiplayer fun for up to four players - Enjoy excellent party fun for the whole family

name: Fateline
summary: 《Fateline》is a phone-simulating game, you will meet a stranger from far distance, give your suggestions through communicating, help him keep away from danger, and gradually become friends. The final thing wait for you is an eye in the universe.

name: Falling Slime
summary: Falling Slime is an arcade stack ’em up that combines matching puzzlers with Falling Sand style games.

name: Falcons
summary: Phoenix clone

name: Father's Day Journey
summary: Father's Day Journey is a delightful puzzle game designed to celebrate the enchanting atmosphere of Father's Day. Flip Father's Day themed cards to uncover matching pairs.

name: Fallen Valiant: Loopy
summary: A girl named Loopy Girl one day gets hit by evil magic. Since then she started an exciting adventure in another world.

name: Faraway Islands
summary: A top-down 2D survival game, set on randomly generated islands you can travel between and explore. Game contains classic survival mechanics like crafting, gathering resources, hunting animals, building shelter and defending from enemies.

name: Faye: A Tale of Shadow
summary: In this classically styled turn-based strategy RPG, Shadow looms over the land causing the Faye to rampage! Help Peter save the world, make friends, and maybe even find love. Fight against Shadow, choose to use items or gift them, have conversations, and maybe find a few secrets.

name: Farm House Night
summary:
Short interactive based on "Boba" Folk horror sleep paralysis demon from Bengal.
You're a worker on a farm, helping your boss and tasks.

name: Fallen London: Paisley
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for July, 2020.

name: Fatal Fantasy VII
summary: Experimental indie video game developed by Team Fatal before Terra Incognita for Net Yarooze. It was a reinterpretation of some Final Fantasy VII themes and characters, created by Mitsuru Kamiyama, who after a few years was hired in Square Enix and directed the Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles series.

name: Fairgames
summary: Welcome to Fairgames - your chance to rob the rich and rebalance the scales. Fairgame$ is a competitive modern heist game where you team up to break into exotic locations and steal the cargo. The twist? You not only need to outsmart guards and security systems - you also compete against other teams. Crews that extract with the most loot and flair might just rise to the top of Fairgames. Take it 'til you make it - who will you recruit first for your crew?

name: Failure to Launch
summary: Failure to Launch is a short physics based platformer where you must reach space with a small space capsule.

name: Fat Slice 2
summary: Slice up shapes with your mouse or finger, reach the goal size, avoid bouncing balls, bombs and impenetrable walls. Better your score and earn achievements.

name: F.A.S.T.
summary: F.A.S.T. (Fleet Air Superiority Tactics) is a modern combat flight sim for iPhone and iPad.

name: Farm Heroes Super Saga
summary:
Match 3 Games - Easy and Fun to Play, Challenging to Master!

Rancid Raccoon is up to his old tricks again. Ruining the harmony of rural life by winning all of the Country Shows and claiming the prize money for his sneaky self. The Farm Heroes know he's cheating and it's up to you to help them defeat him.

name: Fashion Icon
summary: Fashion Icon is a management game for mobile platforms.

name: Far Cry 4: Arena Master
summary: Far Cry 4: Arena Master is a free-to-play, mobile strategy companion app for Far Cry 4. Players collect animals and mercenaries to deploy in automated arena battles against AI or other players, leveling up units, sending them on skirmishes across a world map, and syncing progress with the main game to unlock rewards

name: Fatal Fight
summary: The legendary “two click” fighting technique returns! Get ready for even more explosive martial action with lavish, detailed graphics, stunning special effects, diverse enemies and environments.

name: Fallout 76: Tricentennial Pack
summary: Emerge fully prepared and patriotically styled in the new American frontier.

name: Fair n Square
summary: Bullets and physics!

name: Fallen Fallen
summary: "The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom, And the knowledge of the Holy One is understanding." - Proverbs 9:10

name: Faustian Bargain
summary: Faustian Bargain, first-person horror game that brings a new and different twist to the thriller and survival-horror genres. After the Ouija sessions, immerse yourself in the tragedies of the victims and a story between reality and the supernatural. Play a hero whose life is between dark and light.

name: FarKae City
summary: Beat 'em up

name: Farming Simulator 16
summary: The third iteration of Farming Simulator for mobile and handhelds.

name: Fantasy Royal VR
summary: "Fantasy Royal VR" is a VR strategy battle game played in a sci-fi world. Make one's mark in the world through future virtual strategic sports. Only those who can control various battlefields and unique units can become true champions.

name: Fast Fox
summary: Fast Fox is a game where you have to help the fox to reach the end of the road, without hitting obstacles on the way. You need to accumulate as many fruits as possible to move on to the next level.

name: Fantasy Village Simulator
summary: Experience building your own village with different races in a fantasy world! Produce more villagers for various production tasks and train more guards to resist waves of demonic attacks. Plan the production of supplies to create more powerful equipment for the guards to wear.

name: Fat 2 Fit!

name: Face Racers: Photo Finish
summary: "Developed by Renegade Kid, Face Kart: Photo Finish lets players tilt and turn the Nintendo 3DS to steer their photo customized speedsters through 20 unique race tracks, as they drift around corners, soar over chasms and speed past the competition. Players use the Nintendo 3DS camera to snap their own picture and then map it onto their avatar, the landscape or even a turbo boost so they can pick up their very own power-ups as they race. Each avatar offers up to one hundred choices in hair, clothing and eyewear, plus cars can also be customized by tuning and tweaking to create the ultimate personalized racer."

name: Farscape: The Game
summary: Game based on the first season of the television show Farscape.

name: Farming Simulator 2011: Equipment Pack 2
summary: Expand your virtual farm with Equipment Pack 2 and get into renewable energy! With the earth’s natural resources under growing pressure to provide for society’s energy needs, farmers are playing an increasingly important role in creating energy from renewable sources such as livestock waste and bio fuel crops.

name: Falling Stars... And Other Celestial Objects
summary: Design the perfect defence system for the city in this physics-based game. Stop the falling celestial objects with turrets, fire, lightning, portals and more! 50 levels that will challenge your ingenuity and creativity.

name: Fallen
summary: Finish what had already begun, halt the Darkness in its tracks, and shape a brighter future for the entire world. Prove yourself worthy as a warrior, as you take on what no faint heart could fathom.

name: Farm in Another World
summary: Farm in another world tells about the events of a young man born in another world. A World where you can be agriculture, warrior or fisherman! It's up to you to complete this disappearance story! Don't forget to get along with the people in town!

name: Fatal Fury: Mark of the Wolves
summary:
Garou: Mark of the Wolves, known as Fatal Fury: Mark of the Wolves on U.S. Dreamcast, is a 1999 fighting game produced by SNK, originally for the Neo Geo system.

It is the ninth and final game in the Fatal Fury series, set ten years after the death of Geese Howard in Real Bout Fatal Fury. With the exception of Terry Bogard, the game is comprised of an entirely new cast of characters. Many of these characters reference older characters however.

name: Far Cry 3: Monkey Business
summary: The DLC adds 4 additional missions in the story mode, which involves Hurk to be recognized as a Rakyat warrior.

name: Fantasy Realm Online
summary: A sandbox MMORPG for Windows and Linux, set in the world of Moon Haven.

name: Fall Ball Fall
summary: Fall Ball Fall is an incremental game where you shrink balls using a variety of modules.

name: Family Card Games
summary: Daddy, Mommy, Sarah and Billy are back for some good ol' card game action.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 23: Magic Forest
summary: Join the penguins on their journey to a magic forest!

name: Fallen London: The Queen of the Elephants
summary:
An addon for Fallen London is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones.

The Queen of the Elephants was the Exceptional Story for May, 2022.

name: Fanatica
summary: Fanatica is an visual novel, developed and published by Orbit, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Falling Day
summary: Falling Day is an emotional, story-driven adventure game about coming of age and resolving supernatural mysteries. Two students become involved in several mysteries, murders, suicides, and paranormal incidents. The two must cooperate in order to discover the truth.

name: Farmside
summary:
Place plots, plant crops, harvest, and repeat. Build beautiful orchards filled with bountiful fruit trees and raise chickens, cows, and other animals who produce agricultural products.

Craft and cook unique recipes from your produce and fill orders from the local townsfolk and don't forget to stock up on seeds from Dunn’s seed stand.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 24: Deserted Island
summary: Join the penguins on their journey to a deserted island!

name: Farming Tractor Simulator 2023: Drive Combine & Trucks

name: Farmington County
summary: Farming & country living sim, set in a realistic small-town America. Develop the farm of your dreams using tools, tractors, trucks & other vehicles. Build cabins, sheds, barns, garages & more using a free-form building system. Grow thousands of crops, raise hundreds of livestock and expand your business.

name: Fall of the Titanic
summary: In Fall of the Titanic, set foot onboard the Titanic again, exploring the ship deck for deck. Discover what the layout, structure and purpose of the ship was like in 1912, and experience the tragic sinking by yourself.

name: Fantasyland: All Heroes
summary: All the heroes in the fantasyland.

name: Falcon Patrol 2
summary: Just like in "Defender" the player can move in both horizontal directions while a radar shows him the enemy's positions and landing platforms where the jet can be refueled and rearmed. 15 levels must be completed in order to rid the world of evil. The player only progresses to the next stage when a certain amount of helicopters are shot down.

name: Falta
summary: Falta is a survival-horror game set in a brazilian public school. Play as Davi, as you look for your missing best-friend Tiago through the dark hallways and classroms of your school. Find and collect "mementos", clues about your friend's whereabouts...

name: Falafel Restaurant Simulator
summary: Start your own Falafel shop in a big city and manage your business to make your own successes story

name: Fantasy Cards
summary: Challenge 3 levels of AI in this Heroic Fantasy themed card game. Use the unique skills of your cards in fast-paced battles and deal big blows to your enemy with spells and magic to achieve victory. Whether you're a novice or an expert strategist, you'll quickly pick up the game and face its challenges. The incredible graphics and special effects will impress you!

name: Fall Cars: Ultimate Car Battle
summary: Prove your mettle on the track and strive to become the ultimate racing champion!

name: Factory Balls Christmas Edition
summary: Drag and drop a ball from the Christmas tree over the tools to produce the correct Christmas ball in each level! Complete all the levels, and you can jingle all the way!

name: Farm Manager 2021: Agrotourism
summary: Your farm opens to tourists who want to experience the idyllic country life and visit your homestead. Prepare a suitable place for your guests and make sure that your visitors are satisfied with their stay.

name: Fairy Kingdom: Castle of Magic
summary: Fairy Kingdom is a fairytale about a young Fairy and an evil Witch, of the triumph of love over spite and greed. It’s a story of heroes and their adventures, royal castles and exploration of new lands. This is a story of mysteries, treasures and magic, but first of all, this is your story, Your Majesty.

name: False Hope
summary: False Hope is a survival horror game where you play as Stanley and Harriet, a couple trapped in an abandoned mall. As they navigate dark corridors, mannequins come to life, turning their escape into a fight for survival. Solve puzzles, uncover the mall's dark secrets, and evade relentless threats.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Olympus
summary: Scholars granted access to the most ancient archives may read about the beings who once dwelt on Olympus. The scrolls tell tales of incredible power and terrifying wrath.

name: Fairy Biography 5: Demon
summary: Fairy Biography 5: Demon is an interesting cannon shooting game. Players need to use mouse clicks to control gunpowder props, which can be fired continuously to clear all the treasure boxes in front of them! After completing the level, you can unlock the 1v1 confrontation with the demon spirits~

name: Famicom Doubutsu Seitai Zukan! Katte ni Shirokuma: Mori wo Sukue no Maki!
summary: Famicom Doubutsu Seitai Zukan! Katte ni Shirokuma: Mori wo Sukue no Maki! is an Adventure game, published by CBS Sony Group, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Family Mahjong II: Shanghai he no Michi
summary:
Family Mahjong II: Shanghai e no Michi is a Mahjong game released only in Japan for the Nintendo Famicom.

Family Mahjong II: Shanghai e no Michi is a Mahjong game and the direct sequel to Family Mahjong. In addition to the standard Mahjong mode, there is a tournament mode with a slight RPG aspect to it, in that the player can enhance certain stats after winning games in order to increase their odds in future rounds of the tournament.

The game is a one-on-one version of the game, less common in real-life Mahjong games but the standard for computer adaptations due to the reduced complexity of having only a single AI opponent. Nihon Bussan was responsible for Family Mahjong II's development and was at the time fairly well known for their Mahjong Arcade games.

name: Farming Simulator 22: AGI Pack
summary: Get new equipment and facilities by AGI. Included in the free pack are augers, belt conveyors, grain storage bins and a top-tier seed treater.

name: Fallen London
summary: Fallen London is a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones.

name: Fairy Tail: Additional Dungeon - Rift in Time and Space
Falling Stars: War of Empires
summary: Falling Stars: War of Empires is a fast-paced digital tabletop strategy game where each decision you make forces the game to evolve differently every time you play. Command hundreds of ships in battle, resolve intricate political agendas, and discover the deep interplanetary relations of the galaxy!

name: Fantasy Smith VR
summary: FantasySmithVR is a stimulation-type VR game. Players can experience how to make a weapon, and how to interact with characters or creatures in the shop. The fantasy world setting makes the forging more interesting, magic potion and floating crystals virtually engage players in an incredible magic world.

name: Farming Simulator 19: Holmer Terra Variant DLC
summary: Expand your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator 19! This DLC contains 2 new vehicles and 6 equipment from HOLMER, Annaburger and Zunhammer.

name: Face of the Killer
summary:
All the dogs are laughing - there is talk of a new play.
As fireworks burst over XX City, BB finds herself staring into the face of the Killer.

name: Fallen Seeds
summary: As Evod, a special agent of the Earth Empire, you embark on a thrilling adventure to the enigmatic planet of Ulthar, inhabited by the zoomorphic tribe of the Flock, a biotechnological extraterrestrial civilization. Your mission is to unravel an ancient mystery that holds the key to your destiny.

name: Fake Racing
summary: Indie racing features on-the-fly generated challenges, fake car physics for fun casual playing and custom 1-bit 3D pixel-perfect dithering visual style.

name: Fairy Song
summary: Fairy song is an exploration game, you take part in a vast and mysterious world, where you'll me lots of curious characters, visit various environments, freely explore these peaceful landscapes, and maybe you'll discover the secrets they hide.

name: Fay's Factory
summary: Fay’s Factory is a strategy-rpg. Build a factory and produce complicated spells for your visionary sorceress, argue to the death with both the elites and the working class, travel the world of the magical industrial revolution, and damn — try to make a living among this mess.

name: Fairytale Furnishing

name: Fallen Enchantress: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Includes: 
Fallen Enchantress and the standalone expansion, Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes, the Fallen Enchantress/Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack DLC, and the Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes DLC: Battlegrounds, Dead World, Leader Pack, Loot Pack, and Quest Pack

summary: The Fallout 4: Gold Bundle includes the Fallout 4 game, Fallout 4 Season Pass and a pair of Vault Boy socks.

name: Fastlane Pinball

name: Falling Into You

name: Family Quiz
